courseDescription:
This course, Microsoft Outlook 2013 Basic, will provide you with an understanding of the basic tools and functions that come with using the 2013 version of Microsoft Outlook. You will learn how to explore the outlook interface. You will be able to explain how to preform basic email functions. You will also learn about enhancing email messages in Microsoft Outlook. You will learn about formatting message content along with spelling and grammar checks and enhancing email messages.

This course then explains how to customize your reading options in Outlook. You will learn about attachments and managing your email responses. You will also learn about managing organizing messages in Microsoft Outlook. The course will teach your about using tags and folders when organizing messages.

This course then wraps up with managing with the calendar in outlook along with managing appointments. You will learn about creating and managing contacts in outlook as well as managing tasks and notes. By taking this course you will learn the ins and outs of the Outlook interface and how to use it's many features. So why wait? Start learning today.
